channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: One analyst suggests there may finally be a cloud to silver’s lining
item.description: A TD Securities analyst is warning that the squeeze in silver prices is reaching a crescendo.

item.title: Stunning $110 million Malibu estate once owned by TV legend Johnny Carson is for sale
item.description: TV legend Johnny Carson’s former longtime California dwelling has hit the market for $110 million—two decades after he died in 2005.

item.title: No jobs report today. But that may not be the worst data delay due to the federal shutdown.

item.title: Amazon’s ‘crown jewel’ is this business that doesn’t get nearly enough attention
item.description: Amazon’s highly profitable ad division is the key to funding the company’s future growth, according to a Needham analyst.

item.title: ‘We’re in a market bubble’: I’m 62 and single. I want to move my $200K IRA to a money-market account. Am I mad?
item.description: “I will also draw Social Security when I reach 70, which will be $3,500 per month.”
